title: Club Help
body: After they fix the club, it looks like I got kick from it I cant see the club and it didn't show up in my club part. I am also the leader of the club. Does anyone know to fix this?

replies.body: I have the exact same problem. All my club members have access to the club but me the (leader/owner) can't access it. On my club's tab it says 0/3 clubs. :(

I've got the same issue. I'm the leader of my club, yet I do not have a club tag nor does it say that I am a part of any club. But the rest of my members state that I am still part of the club, just offline.
Yeah I just ask my friend that was in the club I'm in too. he said I'm still there but I'm just offline
